fullForm: University Grants Commission National Eligibility Test
eligibility: Must possess a post graduation degree or be appearing in the final year of post graduation.
subjectsTested: Paper 1: General Paper on Teaching & Research Aptitude
Paper 2: Subject selected by candidate (from 83 subjects)

faqs.question: What is the purpose of UGC NET?
faqs.answer: UGC NET determines the eligibility of Indian nationals for the posts of Assistant Professor and/or Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) in Indian universities and colleges.
